sense.def:
The roots of a plant
so deli rastline, ki rastejo pod zemljo.

seg.quote: These trees have large, spreading roots.

sense.def:
The root of a hair or tooth
je tisti del lasu ali zoba, ki je pod kožo.

seg.quote: They pulled her hair out by the roots.

sense.def:
One's roots
je kraj ali kultura, v kateri je oseba ali njena družina odraščala in kjer zdaj ne živi več.

seg.quote: People are searching again for their roots.

sense.def:
The root of something
je prvotni vzrok za nekaj.

seg.quote: Perhaps the root of the tragedy was here.

sense.def:
To root through things
pomeni temeljito iskati med stvarmi.

seg.quote: Meadows rooted around in his bag and pulled out a map.

sense.def:
To take root
pomeni začeti rasti ali se razvijati.

seg.quote: The seedlings of bushes and trees might take root there.
...the ideas that were to take root in a new land.

sense.def:
To put down roots somewhere
pomeni postati povezan z nekim krajem, na primer tako, da se vključimo v tamkajšnje dejavnosti.

To root someone or something out
pomeni, da nekoga ali nekaj najdemo in odstranimo z določenega kraja.

seg.quote: He's in there somewhere. Let's go and root him out.
